name: Shadow to Shoulder
description:
You are stronger when You're not alone

Shadow to Shoulder is a short, fast paced 2D action set to a similarly fast paced song. You will fight a small variety of enemies in a shade infected castle, but not alone. Your shadow becomes a part of your move set and ensures that Your Not Alone!

This game was created in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

Game design, code and sprites are by me,
Music is by L0st Phoen1x
https://twitter.com/L0stPhoen1x https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMCj59lofMorWcpVYTWVwrg
